name: Abraca-Dog-Bra (Mthynne)
description:
Abraca-dog-bra is a game full of minigames where you as a witch must help cure a dog you find in the woods and then take him to a village to cheer him on in the competition he has always dreamed of winning.

This game consists of sequential minigames similar to games like WarioWare. This allows us to watch and play through the story of the witch and Bartholomew the dog and the journey they share as they work together to get the dog to his competition!

Our team!

Project Owner - Madeleine Thynne 

[Find ingredients game, Match ingredients game]

Project Scrum - Jacob Wilson

[Stir the potion game, Pet the dog game]

Lead Programmer - Oscar Skinner 

[Pour ingredients game, Cure the dog game, Dog beauty competition game]

QA leader - Marcus Arena

[Witch maze game, Dodge townsfolk game]

Designers - Rae, Harry, Charan, Kiah & Jen

Cutscene Animator - Kosta Papanotas

Music Designers - Oscar Skinner & HoliznaCC0

Facilitators - Rex Smeal & Fae Daunt
